pages.text: It allows you to enchant your tools and armor. Each $(item)bookshelf$(0), with one block air between the $(item)bookshelf$(0) and the $(item)enchanting table$(0), increase the enchantment level. Up to 4 candels of a single type will enhance the chance you'll find a given enchantment.

pages.title: How to enchant
pages.text: Pieces can be generated using $(item)lapis$(0) and $(thin)XP$(0) and used in the grid to enchant the item. If you right click on a pieces, it will rotate.
